categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Gargon was group of two Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transports used by the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. Gargon 1 & 2 were apart of two other groups of starships attempting to flee Calamari Cruiser Lulsla before it succumbed to wounds dealt by the Galactic Empire during the Aftermath of Hoth.
